ch08_Array

Class PE_08_02_Sum_the_major_diagonal_in_a_matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch08_Array.PE_08_02_Sum_the_major_diagonal_in_a_matrix

  • public class PE_08_02_Sum_the_major_diagonal_in_a_matrix
extends Object
    (Sum the major diagonal in a matrix) Write a method that sums all the numbers in the major diagonal in an n * n matrix of double values using the following header: public static double sumMajorDiagonal(double[][] m) Write a test program that reads a 4-by-4 matrix and displays the sum of all its elements on the major diagonal. Here is a sample run: Enter a 4-by-4 matrix row by row: 1 2 3 4.0 (enter) 5 6.5 7 8 (enter) 9 10 11 12 (enter) 13 14 15 16 (enter) Sum of the elements in the major diagonal is 34.5
